title: Analytics Dashboard
problem: Users want insights into their social media performance: engagement metrics, follower growth, and post analytics. The analytics dashboard provides data-driven understanding of user activity.
success_metrics: Dashboard shows engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares)
Follower growth chart displays over time
Post reach and impressions are tracked

items.title: Analytics Service
items.description: Create analytics service with data aggregation and calculations.
acceptance_criteria: AnalyticsService with methods: getEngagementStats, getFollowerGrowth, getTopPosts, getReachStats

items.title: Analytics Overview Cards
items.description: Create summary cards showing key metrics at a glance.
acceptance_criteria: Total posts card with count and trend
Total followers card with growth indicator
Click cards to see detailed view

items.title: Follower Growth Chart
items.description: Implement follower growth line chart over time.
acceptance_criteria: Line chart showing follower count over time
Hover to see exact count on specific date

items.title: Engagement Breakdown Chart
items.description: Create engagement breakdown chart showing likes, comments, shares.

items.title: Top Posts Section
items.description: Display top performing posts by various metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Sort by: Most liked, Most commented, Most shared, Highest reach

items.title: Analytics Page Layout
items.description: Create the complete analytics page with all components.
